    • Method Detail

      • createNominal

        Nominal createNominal(java.math.BigDecimal value)
        Create a new Nominal object with value in argument method
        Parameters:
        value - this value will be value of return new Nominal object
        Returns:
        new Nominal object with value in argument method

      • addCustomerCoins2MachineCoinSlot

        void addCustomerCoins2MachineCoinSlot()
                               throws CrossMaxNumberException
        Add customer nominals (coins) to machine nominal (coin) slot.
        Throws:
        CrossMaxNumberException - It is give a throw when limit of nominal (coin) type in machine slot is full and method try cross this limit.

      • getChange

        java.util.Map<Nominal,java.lang.Integer> getChange(java.math.BigDecimal totalPay)
        Designate which and how many coins(nominals) should be returned customers as like coins. It's return CoinSlot which contains coins for customer or null if designate change is impossible or there is no change.
        Parameters:
        totalPay - The value represent of total pay for products
        Returns:
        Map object which contains nominals which and how many should be returned to customer or null if designate change is impossible or there is no change.

      • sumChangeValue

        java.math.BigDecimal sumChangeValue(java.util.Map<Nominal,java.lang.Integer> change)
        Sum a change value
        Parameters:
        change - change in map where key is nominal type and value is a number of nominal type.
        Returns:
        total change value

      • getInfoAboutMachineCoins

        java.lang.String getInfoAboutMachineCoins()
        Give a info about coins(nominals) (type, number, etc.) on ticket machine.
        Returns:
        a info about coins(nominals) (type, number, etc.) on ticket machine.

      • getInfoAboutCustomerCoins

        java.lang.String getInfoAboutCustomerCoins()
        Give a info about customer coins (nominals) (type, number, etc.) on ticket machine. It only coins, which customer add to machine, but the purchase did not come to an end. In else cases return empty information string.
        Returns:
        a info about customer coins (nominals) (type, number, etc.) on ticket machine.

      • setStandardConfiguration

        void setStandardConfiguration()
        Set a typical(standard) configuration for ticket machine. It contains a set parameteres as like: number of ticket types in machine, number of nominals in machine, limit a nominals each type in machine, limit a ticket each type in machine.
